reviews.review_content:
He is the kindest professor I have ever seen.
He really cares about the final project which is the best chance for you to really explore new concepts. He is not a tough grader. He loves optimization a lot but at the same time he knows that it is a tough field of research.
He is reachable and you might need to go to some of his office hours to ask about the homework sometimes.

Workload:
Not that much.
5 homeworks
1 final project
